name: Remorseful Memories
description:
Originally made for a college class game jam, "Remorseful Memories" is a explorative horror game inspired by the likes of "Slenderman and the Eight Pages" and PS1 games. Explore the world to figure out why the voices haunt you by collecting memories and avoiding the ghosts of your past self. 

Controls - 

WASD to move

F - Toggle Flashlight

Esc - Quit game

WARNING: FLASHING IMAGES MAY CAUSE SEIZURES, DISCRETION ADVISED
